CustomField.description: This field is required. It must be manually populated. Qualitative results in a picklist displaying in the risk grade worksheet and utilizes values from the "LLC_BI__Description__c" (Qualitative Value) field on the Risk Grade Critieria object. Quantitative results in a text field displaying in the risk grade worksheet and utilizes values from the "High__c" and "Low__c" fields on the Risk Grade Criteria object.
CustomField.label: Type
